ygData.subject: RE:  bah
ygData.msgSnippet: When I hit 16 I decided to try tinkering so I bought some gears and sprockets to make lockpicks.  I dropped about 60 plat and got nothing in return.  Anyway, I
ygData.messageBody:
When I hit 16 I decided to try tinkering so I bought some gears and
sprockets to make lockpicks. I dropped about 60 plat and got nothing in
return. Anyway, I gave up on tinkering for a long time, but recently have
gotten back into it.

At level 47 and with a 184 int, I have gotten increases from making the
lanterns about every 5 attempts. It may be my imagination, but even a
little extra int seems to help, so if you can get an int buff before going
to work, do it.

Kazaan of Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Aaron Bolch [mailto:aaronbolch@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 1:16 AM
> To: eq_tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] bah
>
>
> From: "Aaron Bolch" <aaronbolch@...>
>
> I have come to the conclusion that learning tinkering is one
> of the lamest
> things Verant has implemented. Last night, I reached level 27 with my
> wizard and sat down to make flameless lanterns. I started
> out at skill 50.
> About 120 lanterns later, I get to 51. About 40-50 lanterns
> later, I get to
> 60. Then I called it quits and started again this morning.
>
> SEVEN hours later my skill has not budged. I made approximately 360
> attempts at lanterns (costing around 600pp after selling them
> back) and
> gaining nothing but a sore disposition.
>
> Now, here is the conclusion that I came up with: I have only
> been able to
> train my skill up to 10 past what it started, which is the same as the
> number of levels I have achieved since being able to gain
> tinkering skill in
> the first place. Yeah, 16 is when it says in the guild you
> get the skill,
> but you really can't increase it til 17.
>
> What I need to hear from everyone is what level they are and
> what their
> tinkering level is at.. I really don't want to have to level
> repeatedly just
> to get decent at tinker.
>
> Phenglei Kai -- Erollisi Marr
>
